chunk: Directions: Apply contents of one capsule to your face and neck in the morning, and again at night. To open the capsule, twist or snip off the elongated tail end, and squeeze out the serum inside. Use your fingertips to lightly press the serum into your skin. For topical use only; these capsules should NOT be taken orally.
book: 3100-Beverly Hills MD Rejuv-GH Timeless Beauty Concentrate

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
